title: WRC is Over
body: <p>The <a href="http://www.wrc.com/Home.aspx?lang=en_GB" title="possibly the worst designed sports website ever made">WRC</a> is over and the winner is Sébastien Loeb with 118 points.  His team, Citroën, also won the manufacturers championship for the second year in a row with 194 points. Here are some nice action shots from the WRC site:</p><p><img src="http://www.wrc.com/ULImages/Photos/cyprus-solberg1-gallery-web.gif" alt="2004 Cyprus Rally - Petter Solberg - Subaru" /></p><p><img src="http://www.wrc.com/ULImages/Photos/martin-lord-36-big-webok.gif" alt="2004 Rally Finland - Marko Martin - Ford" /></p><p><img src="http://www.wrc.com/ULImages/Photos/acropolis-gallery-panizzi1.gif" alt="2004 Acropolis Rally - Gilles Panizzi - Mitsubishi" /></p><p><img src="http://www.wrc.com/ULImages/Photos/solberggallery600.jpg" alt="2004 Rally Sweden - Petter Solberg - Subaru" /></p><p><img src="http://www.wrc.com/ULImages/Photos/australia-gallery-martin1-w.gif" alt="2004 Rally Australia - Marko Martin and the Ladies - Ford" /></p><p>More <a href="http://www.wrc.com/Multimedia_photos.aspx?lang=en_GB&amp;flash=False" title="ugh, that crappy WRC site sux">pics here</a>, and some <a href="http://www.rallye-info.com/images/backgrounds/" title="aww yeah, that's what I'm talkin' about">hi-res ones here</a>.</p>
bodyArticleHtml: 2004 Rally Australia - Marko Martin and the Ladies - Ford
